t: Amazon.com: LARQ Bottle Swig Top 34oz - Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle With Built-In Silicone Handle | Thermos, BPA Free | Reusable Water Bottle for Sports, Gym, and Travel, Eucalyptus Green : Home & Kitchen
s: I've bought 2 of these Larq bottles and I'm giving up on this brand. Both my bottles fell from a little above waist height and the bottle cap breaks into little pieces. I have no idea what kind of plastic is being used on these bottles but they cannot withstand falling at all.
